title:
+Marelda Blue
Darkness that overshadowed the twin suns of Underland had transformed the oddness and ...

attachments.displayName:
+Marelda Blue
Darkness that overshadowed the twin suns of Underland had transformed the oddness and magic into a night most beautifully as the stars twinkled with a secretive shine. For the Stars had watched with such amusement, the gentle White Princess's kidnapping.

It was earlier that day when the Stars where still dim, that such an event was planned by none other then the widely dislike Queen of Hearts who sat on her throne with a wicked smile as the Knave of Hearts, a servant with undoubted loyalty kneeled.
My ungrateful sister's spawn has something I greatly want She glanced at her fingernails before continuing with a hint of malice in her voice I need her here by any means required, is that understood?
She need not glance at the Knave to know he had nodded to her request, and had left moments earlier with the sword given to him
------------------------------------------

Lily, laid peacefully atop her bed with a serene smile plastered on her face. Large balcony windows stood open as the soft moonlight causing her white hair to seem as if liquid sliver. A dark shadow intruded in such a peaceful moment and then in the shortest of moment the stars watch with great pleasure the famed White princess being taken, with only a sliver strand of her hair to indicate that she was ever there.
( Grr too lazy to write the rest, but you get the idea.))

object.content:
+Marelda Blue
Darkness that overshadowed the twin suns of Underland had transformed the oddness and magic into a night most beautifully as the stars twinkled with a secretive shine. For the Stars had watched with such amusement, the gentle White Princess's kidnapping.

It was earlier that day when the Stars where still dim, that such an event was planned by none other then the widely dislike Queen of Hearts who sat on her throne with a wicked smile as the Knave of Hearts, a servant with undoubted loyalty kneeled.
My ungrateful sister's spawn has something I greatly want She glanced at her fingernails before continuing with a hint of malice in her voice I need her here by any means required, is that understood?
She need not glance at the Knave to know he had nodded to her request, and had left moments earlier with the sword given to him
------------------------------------------

Lily, laid peacefully atop her bed with a serene smile plastered on her face. Large balcony windows stood open as the soft moonlight causing her white hair to seem as if liquid sliver. A dark shadow intruded in such a peaceful moment and then in the shortest of moment the stars watch with great pleasure the famed White princess being taken, with only a sliver strand of her hair to indicate that she was ever there.
( Grr too lazy to write the rest, but you get the idea.))
(Dayum, that's a gorgeous peice of writing, much better than mine XD)
I'm so jealous of ur talent!))
( Aww, thanks I don't know what to say.))
